roleset.name: get a commodity in trade
roleset.note: IMPORT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'import' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with 'get' and 'export'. (from import.01-v predicate notes)
IMPORT-N NOTES: Updated by Julia. No Vncls. (from import.01-n)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: Kofcoh is a New York holding company for Rosalco Inc., which *trace* imports furniture and other items.

example.name: with exporter
example.text: John imports a million dollars worth of cheap liquor from Mexico each year.
example.arg: a million dollars worth of cheap liquor

example.name: autogen1
example.text: `` They 'll be more timorous in tackling their own voters , likeopening up more to agricultural imports from America , hurtingtheir farmers . ''
